titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Commerce to provide for civil space situational awareness services and information, and for other purposes.
American Space SAFE Management Act
American Space Situational Awareness and Framework for Entity Management Act
American Space SAFE Management Act
American Space SAFE Management Act
American Space Situational Awareness and Framework for Entity Management Act
American Space Situational Awareness and Framework for Entity Management Act
American Space SAFE Management Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology. H. Rept. 115-1106, Part I.
House Committee on the Budget Granted an extension for further consideration ending not later than Dec. 28, 2018.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 873.
